downloadDescription: The Capacity Planner for Hyper-V Replica guides the IT administrator to design the server, storage and network infrastructure which is required to successfully deploy Hyper-V Replica.
detailsSection: Hyper-V administrators of Windows Server 2012 and Windows Server 2012 R2 can replicate their virtual machines from a primary server/cluster to a replica server/cluster for business continuity and disaster recovery purposes. The Capacity Planner for Hyper-V Replica provides server, storage and network provisioning guidance which would allow IT administrators to successfully plan for a Hyper-V Replica deployment.
systemRequirementsSection: Windows Server 2012 with Hyper-V enabled, or Windows Server 2012 R2 with Hyper-V enabled
installInstructionSection:
- Download the tool (HVRCapacityPlanner.exe) and follow the instructions listed in the document titled 'Capacity Planner for Hyper-V Replica'.
- The Capacity Planner for Hyper-V Replica tool is offered 'as is' with no official Microsoft support. You can post your questions in the community support forum.
